experience.title: Marketing Research Assistant (Academic Project)
responsibilities: Conducted a comprehensive analysis of consumer behavior trends among Gen Z demographics in the Pacific Northwest for a senior capstone project.
Synthesized secondary research from industry reports to identify emerging opportunities in the sustainable apparel market.
Developed and distributed digital surveys to over 400 participants to gather primary data on brand loyalty and purchase intent.
Presented data-driven insights on competitive landscape positioning to a panel of faculty and local business consultants.

experience.title: Independent Researcher - Social Media Analytics
responsibilities: Performed intensive research on algorithm shifts across major social media platforms and their impact on organic engagement for small businesses.
Compiled a database of 50+ case studies exploring the correlation between influencer transparency and consumer trust.
Utilized quantitative research methods to track and report on keyword performance and SEO trends within the tech startup sector.
